cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hitotsu

sentence.kanji: それを一つください。
sentence.romaji: sore wo hitotsu kudasai
sentence.english: Please give me one of those.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's futatsu

sentence.kanji: ソフトクリームを二つください。
sentence.romaji: sofutokuri-mu wo futatsu kudasai
sentence.english: Please give me two ice cream cones.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's youka

sentence.kanji: 八日からイギリスに行きます。
sentence.romaji: youka kara igirisu ni ikimasu
sentence.english: I go to England on the eighth.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nana

sentence.kanji: バナナが七本あります。
sentence.romaji: banana ga nanahon arimasu
sentence.english: There are seven bananas.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuitachi

sentence.kanji: 来月の一日は空いていますか。
sentence.romaji: raigetsu no tsuitachi ha aiteimasu ka
sentence.english: Are you free on the 1st of next month?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nanatsu

sentence.kanji: この子は今年七つになります。
sentence.romaji: kono ko ha kotoshi nanatsu ni narimasu
sentence.english: Our kid's turning seven this year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuchi

sentence.kanji: 口を大きく開けてください。
sentence.romaji: kuchi wo ookiku akete kudasai
sentence.english: Open wide, please.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's muika

sentence.kanji: 六日前に日本に帰ってきました。
sentence.romaji: muikamae ni nihon ni kaete kimashita
sentence.english: I came back to Japan six days ago.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tooka

sentence.kanji: 十日後に帰ります。
sentence.romaji: tookago ni kaerimasu
sentence.english: I'll come home in ten days.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuki

sentence.kanji: 今夜は月がとてもきれいです。
sentence.romaji: konya ha tsuki ga totemo kirei desu
sentence.english: The moon looks so beautiful tonight.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mitsu

sentence.kanji: コップを三つ買いました。
sentence.romaji: kopu wo mitsu kaimashita
sentence.english: I bought three glasses.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokonoka

sentence.kanji: 九日に荷物が届きます。
sentence.romaji: kokonoka ni nimotsu ga todokimasu
sentence.english: The package will arrive on the ninth.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's futsuka

sentence.kanji: 私は二日待った。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha futsuka mata
sentence.english: I waited two days.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shi

sentence.kanji: 四月に大学に入学しました。
sentence.romaji: shigatsu ni daigaku ni nyuugaku shimashita
sentence.english: I entered my university in April.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ni

sentence.kanji: その人には二回会った。
sentence.romaji: sono hito ni ha ni kai ata
sentence.english: I met that person twice.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yon

sentence.kanji: ハワイは四回目です。
sentence.romaji: hawai ha yonkaime desu
sentence.english: This is my fourth trip to Hawaii.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hachi

sentence.kanji: りんごを八個ください。
sentence.romaji: ringo wo hachiko kudasai
sentence.english: Please give me eight apples.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yatsu

sentence.kanji: あの家には時計が八つあります。
sentence.romaji: ano ie ni ha tokei ga yatsu arimasu
sentence.english: There are eight clocks in that house.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yoka

sentence.kanji: 新学期は来月の四日からです。
sentence.romaji: shingaki ha raigetsu no yoka kara desu
sentence.english: The new school term starts on the fourth of next month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's juu

sentence.kanji: その子は指で十数えました。
sentence.romaji: sono ko ha yubi de juu kazoemashita
sentence.english: The child counted to ten on her fingers.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ichi

sentence.kanji: 一から始めましょう。
sentence.romaji: ichi kara hajimemashou
sentence.english: Let's start from the beginning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mika

sentence.kanji: 手紙が届くのに三日かかりました。
sentence.romaji: tegami ga todoku no ni mika kakarimashita
sentence.english: It took three days for the letter to arrive.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's go

sentence.kanji: 五人で旅行に行きました。
sentence.romaji: gonin de ryokou ni ikimashita
sentence.english: Five of us went on a trip.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokonotsu

sentence.kanji: 娘は明日九つになります。
sentence.romaji: musume ha asu kokonotsu ni narimasu
sentence.english: My daughter's turning nine tomorrow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mutsu

sentence.kanji: 息子は六つになりました。
sentence.romaji: musuko ha mutsu ni narimashita
sentence.english: My son turned six.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's san

sentence.kanji: 彼女は三人の子供の母親だ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha sannin no kodomo no hahaoya da
sentence.english: She's the mother of three children.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's me

sentence.kanji: 彼女は青い目をしています。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha aoi me wo shite imasu
sentence.english: She has blue eyes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's roku

sentence.kanji: 彼には子供が六人います。
sentence.romaji: kare ni ha kodomo ga rokunin imasu
sentence.english: He has six children.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nichi

sentence.kanji: 私たちは先月11日に結婚しました。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha sengetsu juuichi nichi ni kekon shimashita
sentence.english: We got married last month on the 11th.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyuu

sentence.kanji: 野球は九人で1チームです。
sentence.romaji: yakyuu ha kyuunin de hitochi-mu desu
sentence.english: In baseball there are nine people on one team.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hatsuka

sentence.kanji: 来月の二十日は弟の誕生日です。
sentence.romaji: raigetsu no hatsuka ha otouto no tanjoubi desu
sentence.english: The 20th of next month is my little brother's birthday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's itsuka

sentence.kanji: 五月五日は祝日です
sentence.romaji: gogatsu itsuka ha shukujitsu desu
sentence.english: May 5th is a holiday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nanoka

sentence.kanji: 先月の七日に孫が生まれました。
sentence.romaji: sengetsu no nanoka ni mago ga umaremashita
sentence.english: My grandchild was born on the seventh of last month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yotsu

sentence.kanji: 私は腕時計を四つ持っています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha udedokei wo yotsu mote imasu
sentence.english: I have four wristwatches.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's itsutsu

sentence.kanji: 桃を五つください。
sentence.romaji: momo wo itsutsu kudasai
sentence.english: I'd like five peaches, please.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hi

sentence.kanji: 夏は日が長い。
sentence.romaji: natsu ha hi ga nagai
sentence.english: The days are long in summer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ku

sentence.kanji: 私は九月に行く予定です。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kugatsu ni iku yotei desu
sentence.english: I plan to go in September.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tanbo

sentence.kanji: この辺は田んぼがたくさんあります。
sentence.romaji: konohen ha tanbo ga takusan arimasu
sentence.english: There are a lot of rice fields around here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mikazuki

sentence.kanji: 空に三日月が見えました。
sentence.romaji: sora ni mikazuki ga miemashita
sentence.english: I was able to see a crescent moon in the sky.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukihi

sentence.kanji: 月日が経つのは早いものです。
sentence.romaji: tsukihi ga tatsu no ha hayai mono desu
sentence.english: Time passes by quickly.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hinichi

sentence.kanji: ミーティングの日日を間違えました。
sentence.romaji: mi-teingu no hinichi wo machigaemashita
sentence.english: I mistook the day of the meeting.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuchigenka

sentence.kanji: きのう、弟と口げんかしました。
sentence.romaji: kinou otouto to kuchigenka shimashita
sentence.english: I quarreled with my younger brother yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's higoro

sentence.kanji: 彼女には日ごろからお世話になっています。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ni ha higoro kara osewa ni nate imasu
sentence.english: I'm indebted to her since she helps me on a daily basis.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hitokuchi

sentence.kanji: 彼はおまんじゅうを一口で食べたの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha omanjuu wo hitokuchi de tabeta no
sentence.english: He ate the sweet bun in one mouthful.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ta

sentence.kanji: 今は田に水を入れる季節です。
sentence.romaji: ima ha ta ni mizu wo ireru kisetsu desu
sentence.english: It's the season now when rice fields are filled with water.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's niso

sentence.kanji: 当時、日ソ会談が開かれた。
sentence.romaji: touji niso kaidan ga hirakareta
sentence.english: At the time, talks were held between Japan and the Soviet Union.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gapi

sentence.kanji: ここに生年月日を記入してください。
sentence.romaji: koko ni seinengapi wo kinyuu shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please fill in your date of birth here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hibi

sentence.kanji: 日々の努力が大切です。
sentence.romaji: hibi no doryoku ga taisetsu desu
sentence.english: It's important to make efforts every day.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nichi

sentence.kanji: 日仏の共同研究が始まったな。
sentence.romaji: nichifutsu no kyoudou kenkyuu ga hajimata na
sentence.english: Joint research has begun between Japan and France.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's furui

sentence.kanji: 私は古い車が好きです。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha furui kuruma ga suki desu
sentence.english: I like old cars.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hayai

sentence.kanji: まだ学校へ行くには早い時間です。
sentence.romaji: mada gakou he iku ni ha hayai jikan desu
sentence.english: It's still too early to go to school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ashita

sentence.kanji: 明日、会社を休みます。
sentence.romaji: ashita kaisha wo yasumimasu
sentence.english: I'm off work tomorrow.
